name: F18 Aircraft Dogfight Free . RC Navy Air Force War
name_original: F18 Aircraft Dogfight Free . RC Navy Air Force War
description:
It is big, it flies 2000 mph/h – and you are in it!

If you ever wanted to feel like a Fighter Plane Pilot this is your chance to make your dreams come true!

With few taps you will be able to seat in one of the most amazing fighter airplanes.

This is the new best war game, hitting the app markets by storm.

This game will immediately transform you into a combat plane pilot with a mission to fight against strike fighters in aerial battles of epic proportions.

Take on your friends or any other pilot around the world with your new F18 and show them your strike fighter skills!

This is what you’ll get to play with:

* Leader boards! (Compare your score with others!)
* Beautiful 3D graphics!
* Explosions!
* Extreme Speeds!
* Shoot! Shoot! Shoot!
* Realistic Fighter Plane Models!
* Intense action movie feeling!

The Army needs you to complete missions and fight off your enemies!

Bring in your friends, get the fuel running, include the missiles & aerial artillery, and fly off to start the adventure you are not likely to forget!

Facebook: www.facebook.com/OscarMiniGames
Twitter: @Oscarminigames
